attributes.action: make the £55.55 carer's allowance the minimum.
attributes.additional_details: make the £55.55 carer's allowance the minimum,one can receive for looking after a disabled person.Pay the carer who looks after severely disabled close relative at home a decent allowance,to which they deserve,working 24/7,with very few breaks.Also now few respite places,because of cut-backs.please give the carer's some credit.
